member.name: T:Coddie.Crud.Evaluator
member.summary: Evaluator sınıfı bize local değişken referanslarının (lambda ifadeleri içinde olan anonymous metotları) expressions tree yapısına çevrilmesini sağlar. The Evaluator class is responsible for creating the expression tree (of the anonymous methods in lambda expressions). Referrer: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/mattwar/archive/2007/08/01/linq-building-an-iqueryable-provider-part-iii.aspx

member.name: M:Coddie.Crud.Evaluator.PartialEval(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Func{System.Linq.Expressions.Expression,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs evaluation and replacement of independent sub-trees
member.param: The root of the expression tree.
A function that decides whether a given expression node can be part of the local function.
member.returns: A new tree with sub-trees evaluated and replaced.

member.name: M:Coddie.Crud.Evaluator.PartialEval(System.Linq.Expressions.Expression)
member.summary: Performs evaluation and replacement of independent sub-trees
member.param: The root of the expression tree.
member.returns: A new tree with sub-trees evaluated and replaced.

member.name: T:Coddie.Crud.Evaluator.SubtreeEvaluator
member.summary: Evaluates and replaces sub-trees when first candidate is reached (top-down)

member.name: T:Coddie.Crud.Evaluator.Nominator
member.summary: Performs bottom-up analysis to determine which nodes can possibly be part of an evaluated sub-tree.

member.name: T:Coddie.Crud.PartialDeleteOperator
member.summary: Defines the . Delete operator for predicate and given objects.

member.name: T:Coddie.Crud.QueryTranslator`1
member.summary: QueryTranslator sınıfı lambda ifadelerini Visitor deseni aracılığı ile handle edebilmemizi sağlamaktadır. VisitConstant tiplerinde 'Contains' desteğini sağladım. The QueryTranslator class allows us to use Visitor design pattern to handle the lambda expressions. The VisitConstant types have support for the "Contains" method. Referrer: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/mattwar/archive/2007/07/31/linq-building-an-iqueryable-provider-part-ii.aspx

member.name: M:Coddie.Crud.Query.BaseQueryBuilder.CheckOdbc
member.summary: Checks DbConnection is Odbc connection type.
member.returns: The if connnection type is one of these (Odbc, DB2Odbc, FirebirdOdbc, MySqlOdbc, OracleOdbc, PostgreSqlOdbc, SqlBaseOdbc, SqlOdbc, SynergyOdbc, NuoDb) returns true else returns false.

member.name: M:Coddie.Crud.Query.BaseQueryBuilder.CheckOledb
member.summary: Checks DbConnection is Oledb connection type.
member.returns: The if connnection type is one of these (Oledb, DB2Oledb, FirebirdOledb, MySqlOledb, OracleOledb, PostgreSqlOledb, SqlBaseOledb, SqlOledb, SynergyOledb) returns true else returns false.
